Parameters: String: Format of showing Date, e.g. "YMD".
datePickerFormat(java.lang.String).Description: Sets format of date Picker or null for default. The format is a case insensitive String containing the day ('d'), month ('m'), and year ('y'). When the format is not specified, a default format of current locale will be used.

date(long).Description: Sets a Date for date picker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone.

minDate(long).Description: Sets minimal Date for date picker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone.

maxDate(long).Description: Sets maximum Date for date picker in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 in @B_java#util#TimeZone#getDefault_E@ time zone.

ClassDesc: Base Builder class to build GuidedDatePickerAction. Subclass this BuilderBase when app needs to subclass GuidedDatePickerAction, implement your build() which should call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidedDatePickerAction#BuilderBase#applyDatePickerValues_E@. When using GuidedDatePickerAction directly, use @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidedDatePickerAction#Builder_E@.
